message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I have to consider my own costs and I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9000?
I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another slight concession. I can do $9250, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9000 again?
